reviews.content: This moisturizing cream is excellent. My skin feels very soft and smooth after using it.
Works really well. My skin feels moisturized and the dryness reduces after using this cream.
This cream has a nice scent and moisturizes the skin. However, it feels a bit greasy and takes a while to absorb.
I used this product but didn't get the expected results. My skin was still dry.
Didn't have much effect on moisturizing my skin. After a few uses, my skin's dryness didn't change much.
This cream wasn't suitable for my skin. After using it, my skin showed sensitivity and became itchy.
Didn't see the results I expected. This cream didn't have much effect on my dry skin.
My skin became moisturized and radiant after using this cream. It's the best moisturizing cream I've used so far.
This cream is very good. I see my skin becoming soft and smooth after using it.
I'm not happy with this cream. My skin becomes very oily after using it and even after a while, it still feels greasy.
